definition: hair/drawing brush/(in the) least/one thousandth/currency unit, 0.1 yuan
not to deviate one hair's breadth (idiom)/to be extremely accurate

sentences.english: They might be,for example,in an accident, and come close to being killed,but walk away without a scratch.
sentences.chinese: 比如說在事故中倖存，差點送命，但結果毫髮無傷。

sentences.english: Fortunately, the temple is believed to have escaped any damage.
sentences.chinese: 幸運的是，神廟毫髮無傷。

sentences.english: The calculations made by computers are perfectly accurate.
sentences.chinese: 計算機的計算毫髮不爽。

sentences.english: He decided to search for it in the land of the Minimoys and try to save the day.
sentences.chinese: 他決定到毫髮人的國度尋找寶藏，試圖拯救家園。

sentences.english: But not all Chinese car companies would escape unscathed.
sentences.chinese: 不過，並非所有的中國汽車企業都會毫髮無損。

sentences.english: Reiko was crying and had a gash on her forehead, but otherwise the child seemed unhurt.
sentences.chinese: 玲子還在哭喊，額頭被擦傷了，除此之外，毫髮無損。

sentences.english: The rich have escaped the recession almost unscathed.
sentences.chinese: 富人近乎毫髮無傷地擺脫了衰退。

sentences.english: It is amazing he got out of it without a scratch.
sentences.chinese: 他能夠毫髮未傷的走出來真的是讓人驚奇。

sentences.english: A hair's breadth is sometimes a great distance. -(Robert Hugh Benson)
sentences.chinese: 有時候毫髮之差也是一個很大的距離。

sentences.english: Ben had a big scare but escaped without injury.
sentences.chinese: 在這過程中班飽受驚嚇，但他卻毫髮無損。
值得慶幸的是艾瑪還是毫髮未傷的。

sentences.english: You can't engage in unarmed combat without getting hurt.
sentences.chinese: 你不可能在徒手格鬥中毫髮無傷。

sentences.english: Yet the little drow appeared to be unharmed.
sentences.chinese: 現在，小小的卓爾精靈好像毫髮無傷。

sentences.english: He apparently walked away from the wrecks, miraculously unharmed.
sentences.chinese: 顯然他從失事殘骸中逃了，並奇蹟般地毫髮無傷。
他們毫髮無傷的脫離了。

sentences.english: He is surprised to find himself whole after the car accident.
sentences.chinese: 他很驚訝自己在車禍中毫髮未傷。
